Procedural Violations Alleged by the Petitioner
The Petitioner states that he was not permitted to be present throughout
the  proceedings  of  the  Board  of  Inquiry  [P1]  and  was  denied  of  the
opportunity  to  cross-examine  the  witnesses  M.K.E.  Padmakumara,  N.
Rathnasiri and K.S.N. Wehella, who were admittedly accomplices violating
Regulation 13 of the Navy (Board of Inquiry) Regulations 1975 marked P2.
